overview: Yalin Ren has over 10 years of analog and RF IC design experience. He was a design manager in OmniVision working on design of analog to digital converters. Prior to that, he worked on cell phone CODEC in Qualcomm and 802.11n products in Airgo Networks. He also designed satellite radio receiver chips while he was in Lucent. Yalin holds a MASc degree from University of Waterloo in Canada and a Bachelor degree from Tsinghua University, P.R. China. Yalin has 1 US patent granted and several technical papers published.
